section-hero.title: Document your surroundings from above
section-hero.subtitle: لوريم ايبسوم دولار سيت أميت, كونسيكتيتور أدايبا يسكينج أليايت, سيت دو أيوسمود تيمبور أنكايديديونتيوت لابوري ات دولار ماجنا أليكيوا. يوت انيم أد مينيم فينايم, كيواس نوستريد

section-products.title: Get a Feel for Flying
section-products.paragraph: With the DJI Motion Controller, intuitive flight is in your hands. [1] Squeeze the trigger and bolt forward or turn a corner with the swivel of your wrist. The controls are easy to use and provide a totally unique way to fly.
section-products.line-p: *Click to Learn More About the New DJI RC Motion 2

section-project.title: Be part of us
section-project.paragraph: Discover our premium drone collection, tailored to enhance your aerial photography and videography. From beginner-friendly models to professional-grade quadcopters, find everything you need to capture breathtaking shots. Plus, discover a variety of drone components to customize and optimize performance.

products.title: Beginner Drones
products.subtitle: Easy to Fly
products.description: Our beginner drones are tailored for new pilots eager to explore aerial photography. With user-friendly controls and built-in stability, these drones make capturing stunning footage a breeze, allowing beginners to dive into the world of aerial imaging with ease.

products.title: Professional Quadcopters
products.subtitle: Advanced Features
products.description: Our professional quadcopters are equipped with cutting-edge technology and advanced features, delivering unparalleled performance and image quality. Take your aerial photography and videography to the next level with our top-of-the-line drones.

products.title: Mini Drones
products.subtitle: Compact and Agile
products.description: Our mini drones are perfect for indoor flights or capturing dynamic shots in tight spaces. Despite their small size, these drones pack a punch with their agility and maneuverability, offering a unique perspective for your aerial imaging projects.

products.title: Foldable Drones
products.subtitle: Portable and Versatile
products.description: Our foldable drones are designed for adventurers on the go. With their compact and foldable design, you can easily carry them anywhere and unleash their aerial capabilities whenever inspiration strikes. Explore new horizons with our versatile foldable drones.

section-future.title: A Breakthrough in FPV Visuals
section-future.subtitle: Equipped with a 1/1.7-inch CMOS sensor, DJI Avata supports 4K ultra-wide-angle recording with an f/2.8 aperture.
